sentences.sentence: Commutated reactance is an important parameter in HVDC transmission system.
sentences.translation: 换相电抗是高压直流输电系统中的一项重要技术参数。

sentences.sentence: The enduring voltage structure and features of Gate Commutated Thyristor (GCT) were analyzed briefly.
sentences.translation: 简述了门极换流晶闸管(GCT)的耐压结构及其特点。

sentences.sentence: A zero-voltage-switching (ZVS) three-level auxiliary resonant commutated pole inverter (ARCPI) is presented for high power GTO ones.
sentences.translation: 对于大功率的GTO逆变器，提出了一种零电压转换(ZVS)的三电平辅助谐振变换极逆变器(ARCPI)。
